languages.text: Пленник кажется мертвым, но вы замечаете, что глаза его, полные боли, неотрывно следят за вами.

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] На пики насажены тела. Похоже, некоторые из них еще живы.

languages.text: The prisoner appears dead until you notice his eyes, which are filled with pain and following your every move.
languages.original_text: Пленник кажется мертвым, но вы замечаете, что глаза его, полные боли, неотрывно следят за вами.

traits.locale_text: The prisoner appears dead until you notice his eyes — filled with pain and following your every move.
The prisoner appears dead until you notice his eyes — filled with pain and following your every move.
The prisoner appears dead until you notice his eyes, filled with pain and following your every move.
The prisoner appears dead until you notice his eyes, filled with pain and following your every move.
The prisoner appears dead until you notice his eyes, which are filled with pain and following your every move.
The prisoner appears dead until you notice his eyes, which are filled with pain and following your every move.

languages.text: Le prisonnier semble mort, mais vous remarquez que ses yeux, débordants de douleur, suivent chacun de vos gestes.
languages.original_text: The prisoner appears dead until you notice his eyes, which are filled with pain and following your every move.

traits.locale_text: Le prisonnier semble mort, mais vous remarquez que ses yeux, débordants de douleur, suivent chacun de vos gestes.

languages.text: 这个囚犯看起来像是死了，但当你看到他的眼睛的时候，你发现他还活着。他的眼神痛苦不堪，看着你的一举一动。
languages.original_text: The prisoner appears dead until you notice his eyes, which are filled with pain and following your every move.

traits.locale_text: 这个囚犯看起来像是死了，但当你看到他的眼睛的时候，你发现他还活着。他的眼神痛苦不堪，看着你的一举一动。

languages.text: 苦痛に満ちた目があなたの動きを追っていることに気づくまで、その囚人は死んでいるかのように見えた。
languages.original_text: The prisoner appears dead until you notice his eyes, which are filled with pain and following your every move.

traits.locale_text: 苦痛に満ちた目があなたの動きを追っていることに気づくまで、その囚人は死んでいるかのように見えた。

languages.text: Der Gefangene scheint tot zu sein, aber dann fallen dir seine Augen auf. Sie sind voller Schmerz und verfolgen jede deiner Bewegungen.
languages.original_text: The prisoner appears dead until you notice his eyes, which are filled with pain and following your every move.

traits.locale_text: Der Gefangene scheint tot zu sein, aber dann fallen dir seine Augen auf. Sie sind voller Schmerz und verfolgen jede deiner Bewegungen.

languages.text: El prisionero parece muerto hasta que te fijas en sus ojos, llenos de dolor, que siguen todos tus movimientos.
languages.original_text: The prisoner appears dead until you notice his eyes, which are filled with pain and following your every move.

traits.locale_text: El prisionero parece muerto hasta que te fijas en sus ojos, llenos de dolor, que siguen todos tus movimientos.

languages.text: Mahkûm, ilk bakışta ölü gibi görünüyor. Sonrasında gözlerini fark ediyorsun. Gözleri acıyla parıldayıp her hareketini takip ediyor.
languages.original_text: The prisoner appears dead until you notice his eyes, which are filled with pain and following your every move.

traits.locale_text: Mahkûm, ilk bakışta ölü gibi görünüyor. Sonrasında gözlerini fark ediyorsun. Gözleri acıyla parıldıyor ve her hareketini takip ediyor.
